abstract: Virtuoso Resources on the Upper West Side rents instruments to players as young as 2 and has an alluring collection of musical mementos.
snippet: Virtuoso Resources on the Upper West Side rents instruments to players as young as 2 and has an alluring collection of musical mementos.
lead_paragraph: Having learned to play the violin as a boy, my husband has long harbored fantasies that our 3-year-old daughter, Meenakshi, will someday follow his footsteps into a school orchestra. While researching how she could get started, I stumbled upon Virtuoso Resources. New York has no shortage of places that stock instruments for children, but for young people eyeing the violin, viola or cello, this Upper West Side atelier offers an unusual grace note: a touch of musical history.

headline.main: A Salon for Musicians Big and Small
